channel.title: Compiler problem
channel.description:
well my compiler for the 508 im working on isn't working right heres what it looks like [code]@echo off cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./Bulby/io/*.java pause[/code]
and heres the error i get, [code]'"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe"' is not recognized as an inte rnal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . ./code]
[/code]

item.title: Compiler problem
item.dc:creator: @cutless cutless
item.description:
@cutless wrote:

and just change the _07 to 11 if your downloading the JDK 11

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problem
item.dc:creator: @gerhardt10102 gerhardt10102
item.description:
@gerhardt10102 wrote:

[quote=“Xile Maizez, post:2, topic:251297”]Get JDK1.6.0_11 ( http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp ) Then use this compiler:

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./Bulby/io/*.java pause [/quote]

Thank you very much

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problem
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Get JDK1.6.0_11 ( http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp ) Then use this compiler:

@echo off
cd ../src
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./Bulby/io/*.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problem

item.description:
@gerhardt10102 wrote:

well my compiler for the 508 im working on isn’t working right heres what it looks like

@echo off cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./Bulby/io/*.java pause

and heres the error i get,

[code]’“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe”’ is not recognized as an inte
rnal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . ./code]

[/code]
